post.description:
Create an application key based on an previously generated
authorization code.

parameters.name: authCode
parameters.description: Authorization code generated from OAuth.

400.description: Invalid authorization code submitted.

404.description: Submitted authorization code not found.

get.description: This endpoint returns a paged list of all categories supported by TCGplayer.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of categories to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of categories to return. Default is 10.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description:
The name of the property by which to sort the returned categories. If not
specified, results will be sorted by name.

parameters.name: sortDesc
parameters.description: If true then sort descending, otherwise sort ascending.

400.description: Offset is less than 0 or limit is less than or equal to 0.

404.description: No categories found.

get.description:
This endpoint returns an array of categories whose Ids were specified in the
categoryIds parameter.  Categories that could be found are returned in the results
array in the response.  Categories that could not be found are indicated in the
errors array.

parameters.name: categoryIds
parameters.description: A comma delimited list of Ids if the categories to be returned.

207.description:
Some categories found.  Those that were found are returned.  Those that were not
are indicated by an error message.

404.description: No categories found.

get.description:
This endpoint returns a search manifest for the specified category.  The search
manifest describes all of the sorting options and filters that are available for
this category. Its contents should be used to build requests to the POST
/catalog/categories/{categoryId}/search endpoint.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The Id of the category whose search manifest should be returned.

400.description: CategoryId is less than or equal to 0.

404.description: The specified category could not be found.

post.description:
This endpoint returns an array of product Ids that match the provided search critera.
Use the search manifest from the GET /catalog/categories/{categoryId}/search/manifest
endpoint to build requests to this endpoint.  If an invalid filter name is specified
in the request, it will be ignored.  Use the GET /catalog/products/{productIds}
endpoint to get the details about the returned product Ids.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The Id of the category to search.

requestBody.description: A collection of search parameters (i.e. filters and sorting).

400.description:
CategoryId is less than or equal to 0, offset is less than 0, limit is less than or
equal to 0, or duplicate filters provided.

404.description: CategoryId could not be found.

get.description:
This endpoint returns a paged list of all the groups associated with the specified
category.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The Id of the category whose groups should be returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of groups to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of groups to return. Default is 10.

400.description: CategoryId is less than or equal to 0.

404.description: Category could not be found or no groups found.

get.description: This endpoint returns all available rarities associated with the specified category.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The Id of the category whose rarities should be returned.

400.description: CategoryId is less than or equal to 0.

404.description: Category could not be found or no rarities found.

get.description: This endpoint returns all available printings associated with the specified category.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The Id of the category whose printings should be returned.

400.description: CategoryId is less than or equal to 0.

404.description: Category could not be found or no printings found.

get.description:
This endpoint returns all available conditions associated with the specified
category.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The Id of the category whose conditions should be returned.

400.description: CategoryId is less than or equal to 0.

404.description: Category not found or no conditions found.

get.description: This endpoint returns all available languages associated with the specified category.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The Id of the category whose languages should be returned.

400.description: CategoryId is less than or equal to 0.

404.description: Category not found or no languages found.

get.description:
This endpoint returns all available media (e.g. images) associated with the specified
category.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The Id of the Category whose media should be returned.

400.description: CategoryId is less than or equal to 0.

404.description: Category not found or no media found.

get.description: This endpoint returns all groups that match the specified criteria.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: If specified, only return groups from this category.

parameters.name: categoryName
parameters.description: If specified, only return groups from categories with this exact name.

parameters.name: isSupplemental
parameters.description:
If true, only return supplemental groups.  If false, return only non-supplemental
groups. Otherwise, return all groups regardless of whether they are supplemental or
not.

parameters.name: hasSealed
parameters.description:
If true, only return groups that contain sealed product.  If false, only return
groups that do not contain sealed product.  Otherwise, return all groups regardless
of whether they have sealed product or not.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: The name of the property to sort the returned groups by. Default is GroupName.

parameters.name: sortDesc
parameters.description: If true then sort descending, otherwise sort ascending.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of groups to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of groups to return. Default is 10.

get.description:
This endpoint returns an array of groups whose Ids were specified in the groupIds
parameter.  Groups that could be found are returned in the results array in the
response.  Groups that could not be found are indicated in the errors array.

parameters.name: groupIds
parameters.description: A comma delimited list of Ids for the groups to return.

207.description:
Some groups found.  Those that were found are returned.  Those that were not are
indicated by an error message.

404.description: No groups found.

get.description:
This endpoint returns all available media (e.g. images) associated with the
specified group.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: The Id of the group whose media should be returned.

400.description: GroupId is less than or equal to 0.

404.description: Group not found or media not found.

get.description: This endpoint returns all products that match the specified criteria.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: If specified, only return products in this category.

parameters.name: categoryName
parameters.description: If specified, only return products in this category.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: If specified, only return products in this group.

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.description: If specified, only return products in this group.

parameters.name: productName
parameters.description: If specified, only return products with this exact name.

parameters.name: getExtendedFields
parameters.description:
If true, include additional category-specific information about each product, otherwise
only return general product. Default is false.

parameters.name: productTypes
parameters.description:
A comma-separated list of Product Types. If specified, only return Products that
belong to one of the Product Types in the list. Some valid values: Cards, Booster Pack,
Booster Box.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of Products to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of Products to return. Default is 10.

parameters.name: includeSkus
parameters.description: If true, include SKU details for each product.  Default is false.

404.description: No products found.

get.description:
This endpoint returns an array of products whose Ids were specified in the productIds
parameter.  Products that could be found are returned in the results array in the
response.  Products that could not be found are indicated in the errors array.

parameters.name: productIds
parameters.description: A comma delimited list of Ids for the products to return.

parameters.name: getExtendedFields
parameters.description:
If true, include additional Category-specific information about each Product, otherwise
only return general Product information. Default is false.

parameters.name: includeSkus
parameters.description: If true, include SKU details for each product.  Default is false.

207.description: Some products found.  Those that were found are returned.  Those that were not are indicated by an error message.

404.description: No products found.

get.description:
This endpoint returns a Product's details using a code from the GTIN family of
product codes. NOTE: Not all products will have a GTIN.

parameters.name: gtin
parameters.description: A product code from the GTIN family of codes for Product to be returned.

parameters.name: getExtendedFields
parameters.description:
If true, include additional category-specific information about the Product,
otherwise only return general product information. Default is false.

parameters.name: includeSkus
parameters.description: If true, include SKU details for the Product.  Default is false.

404.description: Product not found.

get.description: This endpoint returns all of the available SKUs for the specified product.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The Id of the product.

get.description:
This endpoint returns the most recent sales for the specified product.  The sales
data returns is sorted from most recent to least recent.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The Id of the product.

parameters.name: resultCount
parameters.description:
If specified, the maximum number of sales to be returned. If not specified, then the
global default limit will be used instead.

get.description:
Returns other products that are commonly found in the same orders as the specified
anchor product.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The Id of the anchor product.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: If specified, the maximum number of related products to be returned. Default is 10.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of categories to skip. Default is 0.

200.description: Anchor product found and related products returned.

400.description:
ProductId is less than or equal to 0, offset is less than 0, or limit is less than
or equal to 0.

404.description: Anchor product not found.

get.description: Returns all available media (e.g. images) associated with the specified product.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: The Id of the product whose media should be returned.

400.description: ProductId is less than or equal to 0.

404.description: Product not found or media not found.

get.description:
This endpoint returns the most recent sales for the specified SKU.  The sales data
returns is sorted from most recent to least recent.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: The Id of the SKU.

parameters.name: resultCount
parameters.description:
If specified, the maximum number of sales to be returned. If not specified, then the
global default limit will be used instead.

200.description: SKU found and recent sales returned.

404.description: SKU not found.

get.description:
This endpoint returns an array of SKUs whose Ids were specified in the skuIds
parameter.  SKUs that could be found are returned in the results array in the
response.  SKUs that could not be found are indicated in the errors array.

parameters.name: skuIds
parameters.description: A comma-delimited list of Ids for the SKUs to be returned.

207.description:
Some SKUs found.  Those that were found are returned.  Those that were not are
indicated by an error message.

404.description: No SKUs found.

get.description:
This endpoint returns an array contain all of the normalized conditions
supported by TCGplayer, e.g. Near Mint, Lightly Played.
Returns the ProductList specified by using the ProductListId.

parameters.name: productListId
parameters.description: The Id of the ProductList to be returned.

404.description: Not Found

get.description: Returns the ProductList specified by using the ProductListKey.

parameters.name: productListKey
parameters.description: The Key of the ProductList to be returned.

404.description: Not Found

get.description: This lists all the accessible ProductLists to the user identified in the bearer token making the API call.

requestBody.description: The SKUs and Quantities that make up the new ProductList.

400.description: The ProductList contains duplicate SKUs.

404.description: At least one of the specified SKUs could not be found.

get.description: Gets the current shopping cart of the user specified in the bearer token making this API call.

post.description: Updates the current shopping cart of the user specified in the bearer token making this API call.

parameters.name: replaceCartItem
parameters.description: If set to true, will overwrite same cart SkuId quantity specified in criteria, otherwise adds the Quantity instead. Default is true.

requestBody.description: Body consisting of information about shopping cart data to update.

400.description: Requested quantity is greater than the available quantity.

403.description: Specified cart key is not associated with the calling seller or user.

404.description: Specified cart key or calling user was not found.

get.description: Gets the shopping cart associated with the specified key.

parameters.name: cartKey
parameters.description: Identifier for the shopping cart.

403.description: Specified cart key is not associated with the current user.

404.description: Specified cart key was not found.

post.description: Clears the contents of the specified shopping cart.

parameters.name: cartKey
parameters.description: Identifier for the shopping cart.

403.description: Specified cart key is not associated with the current seller or current user.

404.description: Specified cart key was not found.

post.description: Combines the shopping cart associated with the specified key with the current shopping cart of the user specified in the bearer token making this API call.

parameters.name: cartKey
parameters.description: Identifier for the shopping cart.

200.description: The specified shopping cart was merged with the current shopping cart.

post.summary: Create In-Store Pickup Pay Later Order
post.description: Converts a shopping cart into an order

requestBody.description: Object containing details about the buyer and the cart.

get.description: Gets the current Market Price for the specified SKU.

parameters.name: productconditionId
parameters.description: The Id of the SKU being queried.

200.description: SKU found and market price returned.

404.description: No market prices found for the specified SKU.

get.description: Returns all product prices associated with the specified Group.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Id of the group to return product prices for.

200.description: Product prices were found and returned for the specified Group.

400.description: Group Id is less than or equal to zero.

404.description: No product prices found for the specified Group.

get.description:
Returns all product market prices for the Ids specified.  Market prices that could
be found are returned in the results array in the response.  Market prices that
could not be found are indicated in the errors array.

parameters.name: productIds
parameters.description: A comma delimited list of Ids for the Products being queried.

200.description: Product market prices were found for all of the specified product Ids.

207.description:
Some product market prices found.  Those that were found are returned.  Those that
were not are indicated by an error message.

400.description: No Ids were specified.

404.description:
No product market prices were found associated with the specified Ids or all Ids
were invalid.

get.description:
Returns all SKU market prices for the Ids specified.  Market prices that could
be found are returned in the results array in the response.  Market prices that
could not be found are indicated in the errors array.

parameters.name: skuIds
parameters.description: A comma delimited list of Ids for the SKUs being queried.

200.description: SKU market prices were found for all of the specified SKU Ids.

207.description:
Some SKU market prices found.  Those that were found are returned.  Those that
were not are indicated by an error message.

400.description: No Ids were specified.

404.description:
No SKU market prices were found associated with the specified Ids or all Ids
were invalid.

get.description:
Returns all product buylist prices for the Ids specified.  Buylist prices that could
be found are returned in the results array in the response.  Buylist prices that
could not be found are indicated in the errors array.

parameters.name: productIds
parameters.description: A comma delimited list of Ids for the Products being queried.

200.description: Product buylist prices were found for all of the specified product Ids.

207.description:
Some product buylist prices found.  Those that were found are returned.  Those that
were not are indicated by an error message.

400.description: No Ids were specified.

404.description:
No product buylist prices were found associated with the specified Ids or all Ids
were invalid.

get.description:
Returns all SKU buylist prices for the Ids specified.  Buylist prices that could
be found are returned in the results array in the response.  Buylist prices that
could not be found are indicated in the errors array.

parameters.name: skuIds
parameters.description: A comma delimited list of Ids for the SKUs being queried.

200.description: SKU buylist prices were found for all of the specified SKU Ids.

207.description:
Some SKU buylist prices found.  Those that were found are returned.  Those that
were not are indicated by an error message.

400.description: No Ids were specified.

404.description:
No SKU buylist prices were found associated with the specified Ids or all Ids
were invalid.

get.summary: List Product Buylist Prices by Group
get.description: Returns all product buylist prices associated with the specified Group.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: Id of the group to return product buylist prices for.

200.description: Product buylist prices were found and returned for the specified Group.

400.description: Group Id is less than or equal to zero.

404.description: No group was found for the specified {groupId}.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

get.description: Get SKU Buylist Price.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: skuBuylistPriceId
parameters.description: Required. Identity of the skuBuylistPrice being searched for.

get.description: List SKU Buylist Price

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: If specified, only return SkuBuylistPrices from this Group.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: If specified, only return SkuBuylistPrices with this SkuId.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of SkuBuylistPrices to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of SkuBuylistPrices to return. Default is 10.

post.description:
Perform multiple buylist updates asynchronously in a batch.  The response will
contain a single GUID to identify the batch.  All buylist updates are applied
to the buylist of the seller indicated by the bearer token used to make this
request. When the batch has been processed, a message will be sent to your
application's web hook containing the GUID from this response.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

requestBody.description: An array of buylist price updates, including the SkuId and new Price.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: Required. The Id of the SKU to create in the Store's Buylist.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: Required. The Id of the SKU to update.

requestBody.description: The new price for the SKU.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: Required. The Id of the SKU to update.

requestBody.description: The new quanity of the SKU in the buylist.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

get.summary: Get a Store's Buylist Products for Kiosk use.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: The term which must be contained in either the Product Name or Set Name of the Products.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of Products to skip in the initial result set.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of Products to be returned.

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: The direction of the sort to be applied to the initial result set. Products are sorted by Product Name then Set Name. Options are ASC or DESC. Defaults to ASC.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: If provided will only return Buylist Products in the Category.

get.summary: Get the Product Conditions for a Product on a Store's Buylist.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Required. The ProductId to get Product Conditions for.

get.description: Returns a collection of storeKey values based on the search parameters.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Optional filter to search by store name.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Optional filter to search by store address.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Optional filter to search by store city.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Optional filter to search by store state.

parameters.name: zipCode
parameters.description: Optional filter to search by store ZIP/Postal code.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: If specified, sort the results by this value. Default is "Name ASC".

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of records to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of records to return. Default is 10.

get.description: Gets the current Store's Free Shipping option (if exists) whose Seller is associated with the user's bearer token making this API call.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of SellerShippingOptions to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of SellerShippingOptions to return. Default is 10.

404.description: Not Found

get.description: Return address information about the Store specified by the storeKey.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the Store being queried.

get.description: Return feedback information about the Store specified by the storeKey.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

put.description:
If a store's status is either Live or Hold - User Request then this action may be called to flip the store between the
two.  When the store is Live, it's inventory is visible in the marketplace.  When the store is not Live, it's inventory
is hidden from the marketplace.  Stores may voluntarily hide their inventory by switching their status to Hold - User
Request.  There are other statuses that TCGplayer can put the store in that wil cause it's inventory to be hidden from
the marketplace.  Stores cannot put themselves in or take themselves out of these statuses.  Only a TCGplayer admin or
customer service rep can interact with stores with these statuses.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Required. "active" or "inactive"

400.description: Bad Request

get.description:
Returns the total number of orders and total product dollar amount for all orders a customer has place with the seller.
The token represents the unique seller and customer combination.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Required. Represents the unique seller and customer combination.

400.description: Bad Request

404.description: Not Found

get.description: Search Store Customers.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A string of characters representing the first name and/or last name of the customer being searched for. Use format "firstName,lastName"

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email of the customer.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of records to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of records to return. Default is 10.

400.description: Bad Request

404.description: Not Found

get.description:
Returns the shipping addresses associated with the orders a customer has placed with the seller.
The token represents the unique seller and customer combination.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Required. Represents the unique seller and customer combination.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of records to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of records to return. Default is 10.

400.description: Bad Request

404.description: Not Found

get.description:
Returns a list of orders containing the total product quantity and total product dollar amount for each order a customer has placed with the seller.
The token represents the unique seller and customer combination.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Required. Represents the unique seller and customer combination.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of records to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of records to return. Default is 10.

400.description: Bad Request

404.description: Not Found

get.description: Return general information about the current Store associated with the current bearer token.
Return general information about the stores specified by the store keys.

parameters.name: storeKeys
parameters.description: Required. A list of unique keys used to identify the stores being queried.

get.description: Get Product Inventory Quantities.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Required. Identity of the Product being searched for.

parameters.name: includeGeneric
parameters.description: If set to true, generic listings will be returned.  Default is true.

parameters.name: includeCustom
parameters.description: If set to true, custom listings will be returned.  Default is true.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The channel to search for results.  Defaults to 0, the TCG Marketplace.

parameters.name: includeExcludedCategories
parameters.description: If true, will return results for excluded categories.  Default is false.

400.description: Bad Request

404.description: Not Found

get.description: List Product Summary.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: If specified, only return products from this Category.

parameters.name: categoryName
parameters.description: If specified, only return products from this Category.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: If specified, only return products from this Group.

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.description: If specified, only return products from this Group.

parameters.name: productName
parameters.description: If specified, only return products with names that contain this string.

parameters.name: skuLimit
parameters.description: The maximum number of SKUs to use in the inventory summary. Default is 3.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: If specified, sort the results by this value. Default is descending by Price.

parameters.name: includeGeneric
parameters.description: If set to true, generic listings will be returned.  Default is true.

parameters.name: includeCustom
parameters.description: If set to true, custom listings will be returned.  Default is true.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The channel to search for results.  Defaults to 0, the TCG Marketplace.

parameters.name: includeExcludedCategories
parameters.description: If true, will return results for excluded categories.  Default is false.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of StoreProducts to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of StoreProducts to return. Default is 10.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Required. The Id of the Product being queried.

parameters.name: includeGeneric
parameters.description: If set to true, generic listings will be returned.  Default is true.

parameters.name: includeCustom
parameters.description: If set to true, custom listings will be returned.  Default is true.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of SKUs to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of SKUs to return. Default is 10.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The channel to search for results.  Defaults to 0, the TCG Marketplace.

parameters.name: includeExcludedCategories
parameters.description: If true, will return results for excluded categories.  Default is false.

get.description: Related Products are other Products that are often purchased along with the specified Product.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Required. The Id of the Product to get Related Products for.

parameters.name: includeGeneric
parameters.description: If set to true, generic listings will be returned.  Default is true.

parameters.name: includeCustom
parameters.description: If set to true, custom listings will be returned.  Default is true.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The channel to search for results.  Defaults to 0, the TCG Marketplace.

parameters.name: includeExcludedCategories
parameters.description: If true, will return results for excluded categories.  Default is false.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of Related Products to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of Related Products to return. Default is 10.

parameters.name: myInventoryOnly
parameters.description:
If true, only return Related Products the seller has in stock.
Otherwise, return all Related Products.  Default is false.

400.description: Bad Request, e.g. invalid limit, offset, channelId, etc.

404.description: The productId specified was not found.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: Required. The Id of the Product being queried.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: If specified, use this user's shipping country when determining shipping options.

parameters.name: countryCode
parameters.description: If no username is specified, use this country code when determining shipping options. Default is US.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of SellerShippingOptions to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of SellerShippingOptions to return. Default is 10.

404.description: Not Found

get.description: Get SKU Quantity.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: Required. Identity of the SKU being searched for.

parameters.name: includeGeneric
parameters.description: If set to true, generic listings will be returned.  Default is true.

parameters.name: includeCustom
parameters.description: If set to true, custom listings will be returned.  Default is true.

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The channel to search for results. Defaults to 0, the TCG Marketplace.

parameters.name: includeExcludedCategories
parameters.description: If true, will return results for excluded categories. Default is false.

400.description: Bad Request

404.description: Not Found

post.description: Increments the current store's inventory of this SKU from the current Store's inventory whose Seller is associated with the user's bearer token making this API call.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: Required. The Id of the SKU to update quantity for.

requestBody.description: The quantity and channel to update.

400.description: Bad Request

404.description: Not Found

put.description: Adds or updates a SKU to the current Store's inventory whose Seller is associated with the user's bearer token making this API call.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: Required. The Id of the SKU to register in inventory.

post.description:
Perform multiple price updates asynchronously in a batch.  The response will contain a single GUID to identify the batch.  All price updates
are applied to the inventory of the seller indicated by the bearer token used to make this request. When the batch has been processed, a message
will be sent to your application's web hook containing the GUID from this response.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

put.description: Updates the current store's pricing of this SKU from the current Store's inventory whose Seller is associated with the user's bearer token making this API call.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: skuId
parameters.description: Required. The Id of the SKU to update price for.

requestBody.description: The price and channel to update.

parameters.name: channelId

get.description: This listing comes from the current Store's inventory whose Seller is associated with the user's bearer token making this API call.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: If provided, this request will only return groups from the specified category.

parameters.name: categoryName
parameters.description: If provided, this request will only return groups from the specified category

parameters.name: channelId
parameters.description: The channel to search for results.  Defaults to 0, the TCG Marketplace.

parameters.name: includeExcludedCategories
parameters.description: If true, will return results for excluded categories.  Default is false.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of Groups to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of Groups to return. Default is 10.

parameters.name: inStockOnly
parameters.description:
If true, will only return Groups which are in-stock.
If false, will include Groups which have prices but aren't in stock.
If null, will use Sellers 'Hide Sets without Inventory' Pro Setting.
Default is null.

get.description: Get Order Manifest.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

get.description: Get Order Details.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: orderNumbers
parameters.description: Required. A comma delimited list of order numbers for the orders being queried.

get.description: Get Order Feedback.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: orderNumber
parameters.description: Required. The order number associated with the feedback.

get.description: Search Orders.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: orderNumber
parameters.description: If provided, only return the order for the order number specified.

parameters.name: customerName
parameters.description: If provided, only return orders where the buyer's name contains the specified string. Format "Firstname, Lastname".

parameters.name: customerEmail
parameters.description: If provided, only return orders where the buyer's email address contains the specified string.

parameters.name: minOrderValue
parameters.description: If provided, only return orders with ProductAmt >= the specified value.

parameters.name: maxOrderValue
parameters.description: If provided, only return orders with ProductAmt <= the specified value.

parameters.name: channelIds
parameters.description: A comma delimited list of order channel Ids. If provided, only return orders from the specified channels.

parameters.name: orderStatusIds
parameters.description: A comma delimited list of order status Ids. If provided, only return orders in the specified order statuses.

parameters.name: pickupStatusIds
parameters.description: A comma delimited list of pickup status Ids. If provided, only return orders in the specified pickup statuses.

parameters.name: deliveryTypeIds
parameters.description: A comma delimited list of deliveryTypeIds. If provided, only return orders in the specified delivery types.

parameters.name: presaleStatusIds
parameters.description: A comma delimited list of presale status Ids. If provided, only return orders in the specified presale statuses.

parameters.name: orderTypeIds
parameters.description: A comma delimited list of order type Ids. If provided, only return orders in the specified order types.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Used for sorting. Default is "OrderStatus Asc".  Acceptable sort terms are: OrderNumber, OrderDate, OrderStatus, ShippingName, ProductAmt, ShippingAmt, SellerTaxAmt, OrderAmt

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of order numbers to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of order numbers to return. Default is 10.

get.description: Get Order Items.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: orderNumber
parameters.description: Required. The order number for the order being queried.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used for paging. The number of order line items to skip. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used for paging. The maximum number of order line items to return. Default is 10.

parameters.name: includeItemDetails
parameters.description: If set to true, will include details about the products returned. Default is false

get.description: Get Order Tracking Numbers.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: orderNumber
parameters.description: Required. The order being queried.

parameters.name: storeKey
parameters.description: Required. A unique key used to identify the caller of the API.

parameters.name: orderNumber
parameters.description: Required. The order number for the order being queried.

requestBody.description: An array of tracking numbers to be added to the order.
